title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson team up to perform Kylie Jenner's Rise & Shine lullaby
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Miley Cyrus and love Cody Simpson have been hitting headlines with their new love.

This time, the couple jumped on the bandwagon to sing Kylie Jenner 's lullaby Rise and Shine for a sweet Instagram post on Saturday.

Now the Wrecking Ball hitmaker lent her vocals to the catchy track as she sung the words "rise and shine".

Cody played the strings on his guitar to complement his girlfriend's voice.

They looked incredibly loved-up as they collaborated on the tune together in a video which delighted their fans.

"Your new alarm clock," Miley wrote in the caption.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Chart-topping Ariana Grande voiced her interest in Stormi's lullaby when the Kardashian singing clip went viral.

Kylie then joked she was going to drop an album in the light of her lullaby catching the attention of her fans.

Admirers even pleaded the Kardashian to team up with her rapper ex for a music collaboration.

(Image: Instagram)

Elsewhere, romance has been heating up between Miley and Cody as they continue to flaunt their love on social media.

Miley and Cody's love was born out of their years of friendship after they first crossed paths with each other in 2014.

The singer had separated from her husband of eight months Liam Hemsworth in recent months.

Miley enjoyed a brief romantic dalliance with Kaitlynn Carter after they were spotted locking lips on a boat in Lake Como.

But the chart-topper soon ended things after just six weeks of romancing.
description: Now the couple have teamed up to sing their own version of Kylie Jenner's Rise and Shine lullaby
